attributes.action: Make masks compulsary in communal spaces for all staff and secondary students
attributes.additional_details:
As a secondary school teacher I am witnessing everyday the majority of students making the active decision NOT to wear masks, often stating that they are not compulsary.

Without the legal backing there is little schools can do to  enforce their use and effectively protect staff and student families.
attributes.background: Make the wearing of masks compulsary for all secondary school staff and students unless they are medically excempt.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330227
